name: Factorial Complexity
tagline: Polished Mobile Development and UI/UX Design
description:
You've got a great idea for a startup and need to build an app?
- We'll be proud to assist you with this!
 
You're running a business and need to support it with an app?
- We'll be happy to do it for you!
 
You need to maintain or improve your existing app?
- We can do this as well!
 
For six years we have been working as a team and:
- have completed over 70+ projects on iOS and Android platforms (and some of them are still at the top of mobile stores in their categories!);
- have developed 10+ React Native projects and have unparalleled expertise;
- are constantly polishing our skills to be able to solve all the evolving mobile challenges;
- have created beautiful UXs and UIs as well as faithfully followed design briefs (which got us featured in the UI/UX category of Interaction gallery on Behance);
- helped our clients realize their business objectives and raise their profits (check our reviews).
﻿
Let's talk and see if we could become partners and grow together!
